description.english: Death is unpleasant, isn't it?
description.spanish: La muerte se siente mal, ¿no?

description.english: You can die at least 10 times.
description.russian: Ты можешь умереть как минимум 10 раз.
description.spanish: Podiste morir diez veces.

description.english: Don't fear! Die more than 25 times!
description.spanish: ¡Sin miedo, muriste más de veinticinco veces!

description.english: You are familiar with death and can die even 50 times!
description.russian: Ты знаком со смертью и можешь умереть даже 50 раз!
description.spanish: Eres familiar con la muerte y haz murió cincuenta veces!

description.english: You dead, because you don't move under the icicle.
description.russian: Ты умер, потому что не двигался под сосулькой.
description.spanish: Muriste por no moverte debajo de un carámbano.

description.english: Die by just falling on the spikes...
description.spanish: Muere simplemente for callerte en los picos...

description.english: Die by bleeding after step on a mantrap...
description.russian: Умри от кровопотери, после шага в капкан...
description.spanish: Pisa um trampa para osos...

description.english: Die by explosion, becaiuse you like to throw grenades under yourself!
description.russian: Умри от взрыва, потому что ты любишь кидать гранаты под себя!
description.spanish: Muere por explosión, por que gustas tirar granadas debajo de ti!

description.english: I shudder even from my own shadow, because it killed me once...
description.russian: Я вздрагиваю от собственной тени, потому что она убила меня однажды...
description.spanish: Incluso mi propia sombra me espanta, por que unas vez me mató...

description.english: Let's jump in the abyss!
description.spanish: ¡Brincamos en el abismo¡

description.english: Be lost in the static...
description.spanish: Pierdete en la estática...

description.english: You can't use your radio well, and you fall down the first pit.
description.russian: Ты ещё плохо пользуешься радио, поэтому упал в первую яму.
description.spanish: No puedes usar tu radio bien, y calliste en el primer abismo.

description.english: You are pressed by a falling block.
description.spanish: Estas aplastado por un bloque qué sé cayó.

description.english: Find your first equipment.
description.spanish: Encuentra las botas.

description.english: Find the rope.
description.spanish: Encuentra la cuerda.

description.english: Pick up the radio.
description.spanish: Equipe el rádio.

description.english: Find your first and only gun.
description.russian: Нади своё первое и единственное ружьё.
description.spanish: Encuentra tu única pistola.

description.english: Find grenades.
description.spanish: Encuentra las granadas.

displayName.english: I can slip out of the blue

description.english: 10 fails on even "easy" - it's so hard for you.
description.russian: 10 провалов даже на "лёгком" - это так сложно для тебя.
description.spanish: Muerete diez veces en modo "fácil" - sea tan difícil para ti.

description.english: Power of your voice is high enough to activate highly placed radio station.
description.russian: Сила твоего голоса настолько высока что может достичь даже высоких радиостанций.
description.spanish: El poder de tu voz sea tan ruidoso qué puede activar un radio puesto alto.

description.english: You are ready even for an endless waiting...
description.spanish: Estas preparado separarte por un eternidad...

description.english: Jump in the city well.
description.spanish: Brinca en el pozo del ciudad.

description.english: There are some beautiful moments in your life.
description.russian: Даже в глубоком отчаянии можно найти что-то прекрасное.
description.spanish: Á veces hay momentos hermosas en tu vida.

description.english: Try to find at least three trees in single run.
description.russian: Попробуй найти как минимум 3 дерева в белом безмолвии.
description.spanish: Intenta ver al menos tres árboles en una corrida.

description.english: You can find all trees in single run.
description.russian: Найди все деревья в белом безмолвии.
description.spanish: Encuentra todos árboles en una corrida.

description.english: On "easy" run from 1 chapter to the end. No damage. No heals.
description.russian: На "лёгком" пробеги с первой главы до конца. Без повреждений. Без лечения.
description.spanish: En modo "fácil", completa el juego desde el primera capitulo, sin dañarte, ni colectar curos.

description.english: Complete all chapters at all difficults.
description.russian: Открой все главы на всех сложностях.
description.spanish: Completa cada capítulo en todos modos de dificultidad.

description.english: Finish yourself in the deep of caves.
description.spanish: Muerete en el abismo de las cuevas.

displayName.russian: Никто не сбежит от моих страхов!

description.english: Find graveyard and the Fear.
description.spanish: Vayate al cemetario y el Temor.

displayName.russian: Я люблю несмотря ни на что!

description.english: Find the mad love of your life!
description.spanish: ¡Encuentra la insanidad del amor en tu vida!

description.english: Find your wild dog.
description.spanish: Encuentra su perro salvaje.

description.english: Find the Police.
description.spanish: Encuentra la Policía.

description.english: Unlock Chapter 6.
description.spanish: Acessa el capítulo seis.

description.english: Defeat Honey Wife.
description.spanish: Mata la Esposa de Miel.

description.english: Defeat Weird Friend.
description.spanish: Mate el Amigo Raro.

description.english: Defeat Special Forces.
description.spanish: Mate los Fuerzas Especiales.

description.english: Defeat Daughter.
description.spanish: Mate la Hija.

description.english: Defeat your Fear.
description.spanish: Mate tus Temores.

description.english: Complete Chapter 6 at any difficulty.
description.spanish: Completa capítulo seis.

description.english: Complete Chapter 6 at least in "extreme" game mode.
description.russian: Заверши Главу 6 на сложности не ниже "экстрима".
description.spanish: Completa capítulo seis al menos en modo "extremo".

description.english: Catch the fatal bullet.
description.spanish: Captura el bala mortal.

description.english: Fire reaches you and burns.
description.spanish: El fuego te alcanzo y te quemó hasta la muerte.

description.english: Slashed on pieces.
description.spanish: Corto en pedazos.

description.english: Step inside your coffin.
description.spanish: Vete adentro de tu ataúd.

description.english: Great skull eats you.
description.spanish: El gran cráneo te come.

description.english: Scare burns you.
description.spanish: El miedo te queme.

description.english: Find the journal.
description.spanish: Encuentra la jornal.

description.english: Meet the ultimate attack of your Shadow.
description.spanish: Conozca el ataque último de tu sombra.

description.english: Ultimate Shadow reveals to you another path.
description.russian: Совершенная Тень покажет тебе короткий путь.
description.spanish: La sombra última te enseña otro sendero.

description.english: Find short path to the depth of caves.
description.russian: Найди быстрый спуск в глубину пещеры.
description.spanish: Encuentra el sendero a los cuevas.

description.english: Defeat Doppelganger.
description.spanish: Solo puede ser una.

description.english: Defeat Wife with Creator's challenge.
description.spanish: Mate la Esposa de Miel en el desafío del Creador.

description.english: Defeat Friend with Creator's challenge.
description.spanish: Mate el Amigo Raro en el desafío del Creador.

description.english: Defeat Special Forces with Creator's challenge.
description.spanish: Mate las Fuerzas Especiales en el desafío del Creador.

description.english: Defeat Daughter with Creator's challenge.
description.spanish: Mate la Hija en el desafío del Creador.

description.english: Defeat Fear with Creator's challenge.
description.spanish: Mate El Temor en el desafío del Creador.

description.english: Defeat Doppelganger with Creator's challenge.
description.spanish: Mate el Gemelo Falso en el desafío del Creador.

description.english: Defeat Radio with Creator's challenge.
description.spanish: Mate el Rádio en el desafío del Creador.

description.english: Pass the Creator's test and start the challenge!
description.spanish: ¡Empieza la desafío del Creador!
description.russian: Пройди тест Создателя и прими его вызов!

description.english: Find the language interface and break it!
description.spanish: ¡Encuentra el interfaz de línguas y destruyalo!
description.russian: Найди языковой интерфейс и сломай его!

description.english: It was a bad idea to touch them.
description.spanish: Fue una mala idea tocarlas.
description.russian: Это была плохая идея к ним прикасаться.

description.english: You are not good at swimming at blood.
description.spanish: No eres buena nadando a sangre.
description.russian: Ты не умеешь плавать в крови.

description.english: Find where winter smells to get into Church of Sorrow.
description.spanish: Encuentra dónde huele el invierno para entrar en Church of Sorrow.
description.russian: Найди где пахнет зимой чтобы попасть в Церковь Скорби.

description.english: Replace your regular antenna.
description.spanish: Reemplace su antena regular.

description.english: Activate 6 bells and open the gates.
description.spanish: Activa 6 campanas y abre las puertas.

description.english: Defeat Dozen of monks.
description.spanish: Derrota a una Docena de monjes.

description.english: Pick up all souls after Dozen was defeated.
description.spanish: Recoge todas las almas después de que Dozen fuera derrotado.
description.russian: Собери все души после победы над Дюжиной.

description.english: Defeat Sea of Blood and obtain its ultimate ability.
description.spanish: Derrota El mar de Sangre y obtén su habilidad definitiva.
description.russian: Победи Море Крови и получи его невероятную способность.
